user.name: Krishna Kiran
user.title: Co-Founder and CEO
user.bio: Co-Founder and CEO at Duggup - Social network for people in tech. Ex-Amazon Head of Engineering. I write hot-takes on building a business, shipping delightful products and accelerating product and career growth.

posts.content: No amount of technology can convert a bad story into a good story.
Startup Lesson I am reflecting: Don't build for the 'average person'.
Your biggest regrets at 80 will be act of omission
Most people dont have orignal idea. Here is how Sam Altman pushes himself to have orignal ideas
